ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RP server?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah nevermind, the latest thing on the forum for the RP server states that it will be on the test server that is opened by opening testeverquest.exe and that
ygData.messageBody:
Ah nevermind, the latest thing on the forum for the RP server states that it
will be on the test server that is opened by opening testeverquest.exe and
that the characters will be wiped... i think i might still want to play
it... but not sure as of yet

----- Original Message -----
From: Thomas <Fuzhead@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 20, 2001 5:33 PM
Subject: [eqbards] RP server?


> Just wondering but about the RP server... when the open beta thing comes
out
> and people make characters on it... will the server reset characters and
> change back to a real server or will characters be saved? cause i am
> wondering whether i should play the beta server or if it is a waste of
> time... thanks for the help.
> -Tom
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
